dl.dd: The Islands Provincial Park is located on Nova Scotia's South Shore, on the west side of Shelburne Harbour, 1 km (0.6 mi) south of Highway 3.

h4.a: Click here for a park map

html.p: offers a 70-site campground, water outlets, two picnic areas, an unsupervised beach, boat launch, and trailer dump station.
WiFi is available at the admin building only and the surrounding area. There will be a password needed, please see the park receptionists.
